Both "Braveheart" and "Doctor Zhivago" are compelling choices that might appeal to you, given your interest in war and historical settings.

"Braveheart" is a powerful tale of resistance and courage set against the backdrop of medieval Scotland, featuring a strong performance from Mel Gibson as William Wallace. On the other hand, "Doctor Zhivago" offers a sweeping romance and political drama during the Russian Revolution, starring Julie Christie and Omar Sharif.

Both films have received critical acclaim and offer captivating storylines that delve into the complexities of war, politics, and human relationships. Enjoy your movie time!
